title: Dispute Resolver Confirmed Votes Payload
description: A payload encompassing the election event id, the resolved confirmed votes and the digital signature.

electionEventId.description: A random 32 characters hexadecimal string identifying the election event. Corresponds to ee in the specification.

items.description: The resolved confirmed vote. Corresponds to rcv in the specification.

resolvedConfirmedVotes.description: The resolved confirmed votes. Corresponds to (rcv_0,...,rcv_N_C) in the specification.
